[data-ref='reloadBtn'].title: Reloads data
[data-ref='reloadBtn'].content: Clicking this disables task start, end, duration and complete % calculations and reloads the "dirty" data

[data-ref='recalculateBtn'].title: Fixes data
[data-ref='recalculateBtn'].content: Clicking this enables task start, end, duration and complete % calculations back and thus fixes the "dirty" data
